How to use ?

You can play files on your computer with Foobar2000 with the plugin DTS.

Or you can burn a CD-DTS like a CD-Audio simply by adding .wav files to the burn list of your burning software (Nero, EAC,...). The CD-DTS can only be played on a CD/DVD player connected to a home cinema amplifier via a digital connection (Optical Toslink, Coaxial or HDMI).
